march_hare152: I know this is not a big deal in the great scheme of things, but I recently started wearing dresses WITHOUT shaving my legs. I mean, sure I'll shave for special occasions, but I've consciously stopped thinking about it otherwise. The first day I did this and went to work, I spent the whole day obsessing about people judging me. But guess what? No one noticed, or gave a fuck. I guess the greatest thing I learnt that day was that most of these things are only in my head. The world has better/more important things to do. (God, internalized patriarchy really fucked us over, didn't it?)
